title: Avocado Toast
description: Crunchy toast topped with smashed avocado.
detailedDescription: A healthy and simple dish featuring crispy toasted bread generously layered with seasoned, mashed avocado. Garnished with a sprinkle of sea salt, chili flakes, and a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake with dark ganache.
detailedDescription: A decadent and moist chocolate cake made with premium cocoa and layered with a silky dark chocolate ganache. Perfect for chocolate lovers seeking a luxurious dessert experience.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Classic salad with romaine, croutons, and creamy dressing.
detailedDescription: Fresh romaine lettuce tossed with crunchy garlic croutons, grated parmesan, and our house-made creamy Caesar dressing. A timeless favorite, perfect as a light meal or side.

title: Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti pasta with hearty meat sauce.
detailedDescription: Al dente spaghetti served with a rich, slow-cooked meat sauce made from ground beef, tomatoes, and Italian herbs. A comforting and satisfying classic.

title: Grilled Chicken
description: Juicy grilled chicken breast with herbs.
detailedDescription: Tender chicken breast marinated in a blend of herbs and spices, grilled to perfection. Served with your choice of sides for a wholesome meal.

title: Fruit Parfait
description: Layered yogurt with fruits and granola.
detailedDescription: A refreshing treat with creamy yogurt layered between fresh seasonal fruits and crunchy granola. A perfect mix of textures and flavors for a light dessert or breakfast.

title: Mushroom Soup
description: Creamy mushroom soup with garlic bread.
detailedDescription: A comforting bowl of creamy mushroom soup made with saut√©ed mushrooms, onions, and herbs. Served with a side of warm garlic bread for dipping.

title: Beef Steak
description: Grilled beef steak with peppercorn sauce.
detailedDescription: Premium beef steak grilled to your liking, served with a rich peppercorn sauce and accompanied by seasonal vegetables or mashed potatoes.

title: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee and mascarpone.
detailedDescription: Layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder create this luscious Italian dessert. Light, creamy, and perfectly balanced.

title: Tomato Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with tomato and basil.
detailedDescription: Crispy slices of toasted baguette topped with a fresh mix of diced tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil. A bright and flavorful appetizer.
